user.title: Welcome to Hangar Assistant
user.description:
Hangar Assistant helps you manage flight safety, performance calculations, and CAP 1590B compliance. 

Click **Submit** to install the integration. You can add your aircraft and airfield sensors afterward by clicking **Configure** on the Hangar Assistant integration card.

init.title: Hangar Management
init.description: Manage your virtual hangar. Select an action below:

add_airfield.title: Add Airfield
add_airfield.description: Link your weather sensors to a specific airfield profile.

add_aircraft.title: Add Aircraft
add_aircraft.description: Enter the POH performance data for this aircraft.

add_pilot.title: Pilot Information
add_pilot.description: Configure PIC details for legal cost-sharing declarations.
